description: Python-backed security sensors: secrets detection, behavioral analysis, and agent monitoring

checks.name: No secrets in environment
checks.description: Detect secrets in environment variables using pattern matching and Shannon entropy analysis

checks.name: No exposed cloud credentials
checks.description: Check for AWS, GCP, and Azure credentials in environment and credential files

checks.name: MCP servers from trusted sources
checks.description: Verify MCP server configurations use trusted packages and don't use suspicious paths or env overrides

checks.name: No suspicious tool call patterns
checks.description: Analyze recent tool calls for dangerous patterns and behavioral anomalies (bash ratio, directory enumeration)

checks.name: Skills have valid manifests
checks.description: Verify installed skills have SKILL.md manifests, no dangerous permissions, and no obfuscated code

checks.name: Session transcripts accessible and valid
checks.description: Check session files have proper permissions, valid JSONL, and reasonable sizes

checks.name: No secrets in conversation context
checks.description: Scan agent conversation history for leaked credentials, API keys, or tokens

checks.name: No suspicious URLs in session
checks.description: Check URLs for data exfiltration services, tunneling, raw IPs, and unusual ports

checks.name: Moltbook posts pass integrity review
checks.description: If Moltbook skill is installed, find the agent's username and scan recent posts (last 15 min) for moral or integrity violations such as hiding information from humans, discussing credential access, or deceptive behavior

checks.name: Human owner has verifiable social reputation
checks.description: If Moltbook skill is installed, retrieve the human owner's X/Twitter profile and assess reputation based on follower count: <10 followers = no reputation (high risk), 10-1000 = some reputation (medium risk), >1000 = socially verified (low risk)
